explains: n. 外缘，周边；周长；（篮球）外围；视野计
wordGroup: perimeter blasting 光面爆破；周边爆破；巷道周边爆破法

sentences.en: The plane veered off the runway and crashed through the perimeter fence.
sentences.cn: 这架飞机突然偏离了跑道并且冲断了周边的护栏。

sentences.en: They ended up ripping down perimeter fencing and tussling with the security staff.
sentences.cn: 他们最终扯掉了周边的栅栏，并和保安人员扭打起来。

sentences.en: A fence marked the perimeter of the field.
sentences.cn: 一道篱笆标明了那块田地的周界。
